actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide for the reallotment on a pro rata basis of unused Federal funds for social services in any fiscal year to States which previously received an allotment which was insufficient to meet their needs.

summary.text: Amends Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to provide for the reallotment on a pro rata basis of unused Federal funds for social services in any fiscal year to States which had previously suffered a reduction in their appropriations because such appropriations had exceeded the States' needs for that year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide for the reallotment on a pro rata basis of unused Federal funds for social services in any fiscal year to States which previously received an allotment which was insufficient to meet their needs.
